ygData.subject: Re: Area Songs in Lguk [WAS:Does CHR affect Largos?
ygData.msgSnippet: ... Yeah, I have to agree here, in these type of areas and most likely in any multimob scenarios you ll want to lay off any AE.  It s just not a good habit of
ygData.messageBody:
> Why would you want to play AE songs? What songs are you talking about?

Yeah, I have to agree here, in these type of areas and most likely
in any multimob scenarios you'll want to lay off any AE. It's just
not a good habit of getting into. It was fun to Lullaby things when
you were L15, it was cute to play binding at L20, hell at L48 I got
a kick out of that song too, until I got stomped into the ground.

Songs either just don't keep up or are decreased in power so that
they just aren't effective to use once you exceed the song level.
We may be able to DDD/COD PCs in a duel and blue NPCs around L25,
but above L35 if you try any of that junk you'll get kicked in the
junk ;-)

Harmonic.
